extendedInfo.description: Currently 50% OFF!!What the critics are saying:Â· âPandaMania is an awesome game, that every iDevice owner should own! Fans of TD games, check it out!â - Appmodo.comÂ· "The game has a great gameplay premise, and the execution on that premise is fantastic. A good variety of enemies forces players to use different strategies; spear-throwing baddies must be dealt with quickly, and knights with shields must be hit from certain angles.â - Gamepro's iPhone Games of The WeekAn evil thief has stolen your Fu Manchu right off your face, but lucky for you, youâre the most talented bowman in all the land. Use your superb archery skills to punish the evil bandits once and for all. Liberate villages all across the world, and let the bandits know that they messed with the wrong Panda!PandaMania features:- Intense arcade-style action- Progressive and hilarious storyline- 50 challenging and unique levels- Levels span 5 diverse lands- Clever and unique BOSS fights!- Numerous upgrades!What people are saying:Â· âPlayed for over an hour now. Very few iPhone games even pass the 10 minutes mark for me before I'm done. Only getting better... loving it!â - scfr8Â· âI have put five or so hours into this game and have yet to get bored. I love earning coins and upgrading my arrows. I am nowhere near maxing everything out yet.â - BazookaTimeÂ· âThis game is great. I love it. I am a TD lover and anyone else that is as well need this one for their collection, the stages are re-playable. And with 3 save slots and difficulties there is something for everyone. I don't think this price will last long, As this is worth 4.99! Don't kick yourself later when the price goes up, pick it up now.â - SxethangÂ· âThis game is RIDICULOUS! I picked it up and couldn't put it back down. In fact, all I can think about right now is HOW BAD I WANT TO PICK IT UP AND PLAY IT AGAIN -- AAAUUUGH!!!â - K76Â· âThis game is pretty cool. The graphics are cool, the gameplay is smooth and it's addicting. This one will be on my iPod for a while.â - broekenSo take aim, bowmaster! Destroy the horde of baddies to regain your honor and recover your Fu Manchu!Note: Samsung Galaxy S phones *must* be running Android OS 2.2+Bowman, Tower Defense, Flick, Shooter, Addictive, Castle Defense, Bowmaster

reviews.comment: Great iOS quality game for Android!

reviews.comment: Extremely addictive, very well made, runs smoothly, great gameplay, lots of variety and levels, superb presentation. Must buy.

reviews.title: Really fun and addicting
reviews.comment: This game is pretty awesome but I wish they would do an update to add a lot more levels. Please devs, do that soon!

reviews.comment: Fun little game. The art work is impressive. Would be nice if it had HD graphics though for decides like the EVO.

reviews.comment: The best game of this kind on market. Hours of fun and varied enemies & levels. Must have

reviews.comment: Fun game. Simple and effective control concept. Story is comical and looks decent visually. Enough effort went into this game to make it worth the $.

reviews.title: Crashes all the time
reviews.comment: This game is so addictive but frustrating, every time I play after little time the game vibrates then returns to home screen. It doesnt even stay open. Not only that the home button is always in the way so it closes often because i accidently press it during game play. Too bad because this game would get a 5/5 if they would fix this for the galaxy s2. Please if you are reading this dev team please fix the issue. I also get a weird screwed up start screen before the menu when I first load the game.
reviews.author: A Google User
